description: ff. 69. 182 x 137; 145 x 100 mm. 23 lin. 15th cen. Anon. commentary on al-Nasafīʼs creed, mentioned by ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1169, lin. 4; the ms. Berlin 1992 (Brockelmann, GAL, II, 253, commentary 2) contains in reality the creed of al-Māturīdī. Incip.: ... الحمد لمن نطق بوجوب وجوده ... قوله حقائق الاشىاء ثابتة اى ماهىات الاشىاء موجودة
title: Sharḥ ʻUmdat al-ʻaqāʼid.
subject: Nasafī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad, d. 1310—ʻUmdat al-ʻaqāʼid.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
